name: Victorian Mouse
description: A wee pattern to wet your whistle for what is to come in the very near future -- Victorian Housecats to Knit.
full_text: A wee pattern to wet your whistle for what is to come in the very near future -- Victorian Housecats to Knit. A brand new book filled with unique and realistic cat patterns. Currently available for preorder online wherever books are sold. Here is the Amazon link. This little mouse is worked in the round on double pointed needles from the tip of his nose to the end of his tail. Tiny ears and front legs are added after the body is finished. He is about 3” long (not including tail).
